file_content.text: Sith, are you lost? You're in a Republic-aligned corporate headquarters.
Stand down. We are on the same side.
I know you're Imperial.
I--uh--don't know what you're talking about.
The consortium of corporations has cameras in every corporate lobby, so we are being observed by the Empire's enemies as we speak.
And why should this bother me?
So?
Your accent is poking through, fool.
You're a bad actor.
Uh--well, never mind that!
A Sith comes in here, he's gonna meet resistance. So--uh--we're going to have to kill you.
Stop pretending, you're getting on my nerves.
Give up the annoying act.
Really sorry, just can't do that.
Then you die at my hands.
It's your funeral. [Attack]
Sound the alarm!
You don't have to die. I know this is Darth Vowrawn's headquarters. I'm a friend. I come in peace.
I'm here to help.
What if I surrender and you can make a show of taking me into custody?
Good plan. Follow my lead, my lord.
All right, men, make this look good. You're outnumbered, Sith! Put your hands up and don't make another move!
Glad you came to your senses. Now you're going to our chief of security in the next room.
Thanks for helping me avoid a messy situation, my lord.
Lord Haresh is in charge. He's just down there.
